text:
A nice decently sized park that is minutes walk away from Tiong Bahru MRT, and about 1km walk away from Redhill MRT.

The park features a big playground for children, a therapeutic garden, some gazebos, many sheltered areas with seating, and a dog run. Thereâ€™s also a public restroom with water coolers for drinking.

Very nice small park in the center of the city. Has enough to entertain the kids and the youngsters as well as the elderly. Further boosted by a nice small dog run park area enclosure. Has great swings and slides and exercise equipments. Is 5 minutes walk from Tiong Bahru mrt and easily accessible by bus
Nice small park with many activities for families to play and spend  some  hours outdoors , and for those who want to exercise. You can find, picnic areas,  tables, toilets and drinking fountains.
Lovely neighbourhood park with excellent amenities including a public toilet and an impressive playground.

One of the most beautiful parks in Singapore that I have come across. There's a tilting train with numerous slides coming out on both sides of the train cabins. There's also sand in the park and kids love to play in the sand and built sand castles! Surely one of the most fun parks for kids around. There are also two flying foxes set up and my first time seeing this in a playground! There are also other playground set up for toddlers as well as an exercise park for the elderly. Extremely impressed by this park set up. A 'must' visit for kids!!! And it's free too.
